name: Dark Comfort for Crowdin

user.name: R3gi CZ
user.about:
I'm hobby amateur designer from Czech Republic. Here I would like to share UI styles for services I use a lot. I think it's better to share them than just keep them for my personal use. That's all. I hope you'll find them useful.

If you like my work, you can write me some feedback or you can by me a beer ;-)

additional_info:
Dark UI theme for Crowdin.com (translation service).
Author: R3gi, Czech Republic

I've created this dark skin for Crowdin when I was bored. I hope you will find it pleasing for your eyes while you will work on translations.

Note: It doesn't fully cover the whole Crowdin website, since it's quite large. It also doesn't affect the layout of the page, it only changes colors.

If you find it useful, don't be afraid to leave a comment or you can by me a beer ;-)
css:
@-moz-document domain("crowdin.com"), domain("crowdin.net"), domain("i18n.discordapp.com") {
/* Dark Comfort for Crowdin by R3gi, Czech Republic
Version: 2019.01.27.18.12 */
/* GENERAL backround and text color*/

body,
#left_panel,
#right_panel,
#editor-center-layout,
.editor-proofread-field,
.project-details,
.grey-holder,
.nav-tabs,
.mail-table td,
body.project-settings,
.project-settings-wrapper,
.project-settings-wrapper .application-navbar,
.vendors-list-holder,
#jipt-modal-mask {
	color: #E0E0E0;
	background-color: #263238;
}

/* NO text shadow */
.numbered-control-group:before,
.numbered-label:before {
	text-shadow: none !important;
}

/* Default text color */
.project-files-manager .node > .node-inner > .crowdin-progress-text,
.project-breadcrumb a,
ul.list-activity li,
.texts-to-translate-list li a,
.ui-widget-content,
.navbar-inverse .brand,
.navbar-inverse .nav > li > a,
.editor-current-translation-source .context,
.proofread-string-source .context,
.terms-list .term-description,
.translation_context span a,
#source_context_container span a,
.username-link,
.user-prefered-languages li,
.chosen-container .chosen-results,
.settings-left-pills .ul-wrapper ul.nav-pills li a,
.qq-upload-block,
.qq-upload-drop-area,
.list-notification-container .description,
.list-notification-container .string,
.list-notification-container .quote,
.navbar-content .navbar-nav > li > a,
.conversation-count,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder .plan-item .plan-price .plan-price-admeasurement,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder .plan-item .plan-price .plan-price-currency,
#footer a,
.crowdin-jipt,
.web-xml-tag-title,
.web-xml-tag-context-title,
.project_files_header + .language-header,
.numbered-control-group:before,
.numbered-label:before,
#ps-reports .export-date-range,
#ps-reports .legend-holder .legend-item.active,
.users-counter,
.project-secondary-title a.title-project-name {
	color: #BDBDBD;
}

/* Default text color â€“ !iportant */
.phrases-displayed,
.message-table-mail-subject a,
.message-table-topic-subject a,
.items-displayed,
.jipt_user_name a,
.unread .message-table-mail-subject a,
.unread .message-table-topic-subject a {
	color: #BDBDBD !important;
}

/* Light text color */
.ajax-link-black,
#ps-reports .nav-tabs > li > a,
#footer .footer-links strong,
.muted,
.project-table-accessed,
.help-block,
.help-inline,
#selected_languages_count,
.selected_languages_info,
li.jstree-leaf > a,
li.jstree-open > a,
li.jstree-closed > a,
li.jstree-leaf > a:hover,
li.jstree-open > a:hover,
li.jstree-closed > a:hover,
textarea::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="text"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="password"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="datetime"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="datetime-local"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="date"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="month"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="time"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="week"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="number"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="email"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="url"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="search"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="tel"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
input[type="color"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
.application .daterangepicker .ranges li,
.pricing .div-table .div-table-cell.year.active,
.pricing .div-table .div-table-cell.month.active,
.tour .section p,
.tour .section h5,
.tour .section .container > h2 + p,
#footer a:hover,
#footer a:focus,
a.link-muted:hover,
.link-muted:hover,
.checklist-js-result .center,
.chosen-container-multi .chosen-choices li.search-field input[type="text"],
.review-chart .star-name,
.review-chart .star-count,
.jipt-dialog-title h4,
.jipt-dialog-title-buttons > a,
.jipt-phrases-to-translate a,
.navbar-default .logo-plus,
.navbar-default .navbar-nav > li > a,
.link-with-icon-tagline,
.crowdin-jipt-login-header,
.main-page p,
.language-filter-table .active a,
.project-secondary-title .title-name,
.text-overflow a,
.user-preferred-languages li,
.btn.mdc-button,
.nav-list>li>a,
#main_menu .nav-pills>li>a {
	color: #CFD8DC !important;
}

/* Lighter text color */
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
.h1,
.h2,
.h3,
.h4,
.h5,
.h6 .project_files_header > span,
.navbar .application-navbar .nav > li > a,
h2.username,
a > strong,
.dropdown-menu li > a,
.list-activity-action .user-link,
ul.list-activity > li .filename,
.list-activity-action .user-link b,
.list-activity-action a b,
.nav-tabs > li > a,
.editor-source-container,
.texts-to-translate-list li a:hover,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar,
legend,
.files-js-legend,
.suggestion_tm_source,
.suggestion_tm_source ins,
table#editor-hotkeys-table input:hover,
.editor-proofread-field,
.terms-list .term-headline,
.translation_context span a:hover,
#source_context_container span a:hover,
.list-notification-container .msg a:hover,
.loadmask-msg,
.jumbotron.crowdin-hero-unit,
.chosen-container .chosen-results li.highlighted,
#ps-reports .nav-tabs > .active a,
#ps-reports .nav-tabs > li:hover a,
.active-dialog .jipt-dialog-title h4,
.jipt-dialog-title-buttons > a:hover,
#crowdin-translation-panel .jipt-phrases-to-translate a:hover,
.translations-vendors-list .translation-vendor h4 a,
.navbar-default .logo-plus:hover,
.navbar-default .logo-plus:active,
.price-value,
.project-secondary-title a.title-project-name:hover,
code, pre {
	color: #FAFAFA;
}

/* WHITE text color */
.jGrowl-notification.jGrowl-success .jGrowl-message,
.jGrowl-notification.jGrowl-success .jGrowl-close,
.user-avatar-button {
	color: #FFFFFF !important;
}

/* BLACK text color */
.texts-to-translate-list li.status_select a,
.mobile-view .texts-to-translate-list li.status_select a,
div.jGrowl-notification.jGrowl-notice .jGrowl-message,
div.jGrowl-notification.jGrowl-notice .jGrowl-close,
.btn-group.open .btn.dropdown-toggle {
	color: #000000 !important;
}

/* GREEN text color */
a,
.btn-link,
.link-black,
.approve-author,
.suggestion-author,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder .plan-item .plan-price,
#footer .crowdin-copyright,
.main-page .what-is-crowdin a,
#ui-datepicker-div .ui-widget-header {
	color: #7CB342;
}

/* LIME GREEN text color */
.project-row .project-row-link:hover a.project-name,
a:hover,
a.hover,
.btn-link:hover,
.project-breadcrumb a:hover,
table#editor-hotkeys-table input,
.list-notification-container .msg a,
.link-black:hover,
.main-page .what-is-crowdin a:hover,
.input .preset {
	color: #93DA3B;
	text-decoration: none;
}

.icu_placeholder {
	color: #93DA3B !important;
}

/* BLUE text color*/
.icu_style {
	color: #2196F3 !important;
}

/* BASIC border*/
hr,
.other_terms_separator,
.suggestions_separator,
.glossary_separator,
.project-row > .project-row-holder,
.user-prefered-languages,
#footer .container,
.project-row > .project-row-holder,
.nav-tabs,
.project-table,
.dropdown-menu .divider,
.project-files-manager,
.notification-dropdown .dropdown-title,
.notification-dropdown .notification-footer,
.project-languages-filter,
.project-activities-filter,
.profile-activities-filter,
.table th,
.table td,
.concordance-input,
.glossary-input,
.node-inner,
.node-inner.checked,
.node-inner.even,
.terms-list .term + .term > .term-inner,
.project-target-languages + .project-target-languages,
.suggestion-rating,
#settings-languages .checklist-js-result li > div,
.tabs-left > .nav-tabs,
#login-register-div .login-register .left-col.signin-social,
#login-register-div .login-register .right-col.signin-social,
.jumbotron.crowdin-hero-unit,
#user-projects-list > li,
.professional_translations_data,
#order_details,
.vendor-page .review-list .review-list-holder,
.files-js-legend > div + div,
hr.jipt-hr,
.settings-left-pills .ul-wrapper,
.context-screenshots,
#user-profile-avatar .qq-uploader,
#settings-languages .checklist-js-result li .native-checker,
.language-header-underline, .last-topic-message-underline,
#main_menu .pull-left {
	border-color: #37474F;
}

.checklist-single-group+.checklist-single-group:before,
.nav-list .divider {
    background-color: #37474F;
    border-color: #37474F;
}

/* MAIN border */
#editor-center-layout .editor-pane-inner,
.invisible-textarea-wrapper,
.files-js-legend,
.table-bordered,
.languages-filter-form,
.mail-table,
legend,
.qq-uploader,
#profile-projects-list .project-languages-block-title,
#job_files tr td,
.items-js-simple,
.items-js tbody,
.items-js .items-js-content td,
.items-js .items-js-content tr:nth-child(odd) td,
#user_tasks_table table th,
.items-js th > div,
.items-js thead,
.items-js .items-js-content tr.checked td,
#login-register-div .login-register,
#invite_translators_dialog .dialog-full-width-block,
#invite_message_frame,
#contact_message_frame,
#drop-screenshots-box .qq-uploader,
#ps-api .items-js thead,
.list-notification-container .quote,
.items-js-light,
#ris-search-results-suggestions,
.costs-rates-configurator-wrapper .rates-config-group-limiter,
.tc-result-holder .language-report-table td,
.messages-advanced-search:not(.mobile),
.navbar-inner.settings-navbar,
blockquote {
	border-color: #607D8B;
}

.popover.top .arrow:after {
	border-top-color: #607D8B;
}

/* MAIN border â€“ !important */
.clearfix,
#change_file_manager {
	border-color: #607D8B !important;
}

/* LIGHT border */
.term_item,
.workflow-preview:hover > div,
abbr[title],
abbr[data-original-title] {
	border-color: #BDBDBD;
}

/* FRONT border color */
.jipt-editor-dialog .jipt-dialog-content,
.jipt-dialog-buttons {
	border-color: #32799a;
}

/* LIGHT text border */
a.jipt-minimize-btn span {
	border-color: #CFD8DC;
}

/* LIGHTER text border */
a.jipt-minimize-btn:hover span {
	border-color: #FAFAFA;
}

/* Light BUTTON border color */
.btn.active, .btn:active {
    border-color: #90A4AE;
}

/* TRANSPARENT border */
#ps-reports .nav-tabs > .active a:before,
#footer .container,
.navbar-default .logo-plus:hover,
.navbar-default .logo-plus:active {
	border-color: transparent;
}

/* FRONT elements */
.navbar-inner,
.navbar-inner.editor-navbar,
#profile-projects-list .project-languages-block,
.dropdown-menu,
.general_activity_item.opened,
.dropdown-menu .divider,
.ui-widget-content,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-buttonpane,
.files-js-container,
.chosen-container .chosen-drop,
.modal,
.modal-footer,
.progress,
.navbar-content,
.workflow-preview > div,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder .plan-item,
#footer,
.col-sm-4.col-sm-offset-1,
.demo-item,
.tour .section.strategies,
.tour .section.strategies .tour-strategies,
.form-actions,
.ps-toolbar,
#ui-datepicker-div .ui-widget-header,
.professional_translations_legend,
#tm-legend-div,
.profile-page-content .tabs-left > .nav-tabs > li.active > a,
.messages-section.tabs-left > .nav-tabs > li.active > a,
.navbar-default,
.file-element,
.messages-contact:hover:not(.mobile):not(.active) {
	background-color: #455A64 !important;
	border-color: #607D8B;
}

.nav-tabs > .active > a,
ul.list-activity h6 span,
ul.list-notification h6 span,
.navbar-inverse .nav li.dropdown.open > .dropdown-toggle,
.navbar-inverse .nav li.dropdown.active > .dropdown-toggle,
.navbar-inverse .nav li.dropdown.open.active > .dropdown-toggle,
.filter-form-links a.active,
.filter-form-links a.active:hover,
.translations-vendors-list .translation-vendor.selected-vendor,
.workflow-preview .workflow-p-title,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder .plan-item.recommended,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder > h3,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder > .footer-plans,
#ui-datepicker-div .ui-state-default,
#ui-datepicker-div .ui-widget-content .ui-state-default,
#ps-reports .nav-tabs > .active,
#ps-reports .nav-tabs > .active:hover,
#ps-reports .nav-tabs > li:hover,
.navbar .nav li.dropdown.open > .dropdown-toggle,
.navbar .nav li.dropdown.active > .dropdown-toggle,
.navbar .nav li.dropdown.open.active > .dropdown-toggle,
ul.list-activity > li.create_project,
ul.list-activity > li.create_project:hover,
ul#translation_panel_tabs li.active a,
div.messages-separator h6 span, ul.list-activity h6 span, ul.list-notification h6 span,
#main_menu {
	background-color: #607D8B;
	color: #FAFAFA;
	border-color: #607D8B;
}

/* FRONT DIALOG */
.jipt-dialog,
.jipt-dialog-title,
.active-dialog .jipt-dialog-title {
	background-color: #32799a;
	color: #FAFAFA;
	border-color: #32799a;
}

/* DROPDOWN */
.navbar .nav > li > a:focus,
.navbar .nav > li > a:hover,
.nav > li > a:hover,
.nav-tabs > .active > a:hover,
.navbar .open .dropdown-toggle,
.nav .navbar > li.dropdown.open.active > a:hover,
.suggestion.checked,
.dropdown-menu li > a:hover,
.dropdown-menu li > a:focus,
.dropdown-submenu:hover > a,
.drop-down-icon:hover + a,
.navbar .nav > .active > a,
.navbar .nav > .active > a:hover,
.navbar .nav > .active > a:focus,
.target-languages-checklist .right,
.popover,
.application .daterangepicker .ranges li:hover,
.application .daterangepicker .ranges li.active,
ul.list-activity > li.build_project:not(.opened),

ul.list-activity > li.build_project.opened,
ul.list-activity > li.build_project.opened:hover,
.project-settings-wrapper .application-navbar .nav .active > a,
#ui-datepicker-div,
.tag_screenshot_help {
	background-color: #607D8B;
	color: #FFFFFF;
	border-color: transparent;
}

.jGrowl-notification.jGrowl-notice {
	border-color: #263238;
}

.jGrowl .jGrowl-notification {
	background-color: #F9A825;
}

.notification-dropdown .dropdown-title,
.notification-footer {
	background-color: #607D8B;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}

/* INPUT fields */
select,
textarea,
.input,
input[type="text"],
input[type="password"],
input[type="datetime"],
input[type="datetime-local"],
input[type="date"],
input[type="month"],
input[type="time"],
input[type="week"],
input[type="number"],
input[type="email"],
input[type="url"],
input[type="search"],
input[type="tel"],
input[type="color"],
.uneditable-input,
.chosen-container-single .chosen-single,
.uneditable-input .bar_button a,
.btn,
.navbar-search .search-query,
.phrases-search-options a:active,
.phrases-search-options .active a,
.pagination ul > li > a,
.pagination ul > li > span,
.form-control,
.chosen-container-multi .chosen-choices,
.well,
.crowdin-jipt input[type="text"],
.crowdin-jipt input[type="password"],
.crowdin-jipt select {
	background-color: #607D8B;
	color: #FAFAFA;
	border-color: #90A4AE;
}

/* DISABLED items*/
.btn.disabled,
.btn[disabled],
.btn.disabled:hover,
.btn[disabled]:hover,
input[disabled],
select[disabled],
textarea[disabled],
input[readonly],
select[readonly],
textarea[readonly] {
	background-color: #455A64;
	border-color: #607D8B;
	color: #78909C;
}

.bar_button a:hover,
.btn:hover,
.btn.btn-icon:hover,
#login-register-div .login-register .left-col.signin-social .btn-sso:hover,
#login-register-div .login-register .right-col.signin-social .btn-sso:hover,
#editor_search_bar:focus,
.ui-button.ui-state-default {
	transition: 0.2s;
	color: #FAFAFA;
	border-color: #ECEFF1;
	background-color: #78909c;
}

/* ACTIVE filter button */
.btn.btn-icon.active,
.btn.btn-icon:active,
.btn-group.open .dropdown-toggle.btn-icon,
.btn-group.open .dropdown-toggle.btn-icon:hover,
.pane-toggler:active,
.language-filter-table .active a {
	border-color: #8BC34A;
	background: #607d8b;
}

/* NO BACKGROUND image */
body.login,
.pattern,
.jumbotron.crowdin-hero-unit {
	background-image: none;
}

.pagination ul > li > a:hover,
.pagination ul > .active > a,
.pagination ul > .active > span,
.btn-group.open .btn.dropdown-toggle,
.bar_button a:active,
.btn.active,
.btn:active {
	background-color: #B0BEC5;
}

ul.list-notification h6:before,
ul.list-activity h6:before,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-buttonpane,
.files-js-legend,
.pane-toggler,
.items-js .items-js-content tr.checked td,
.items-js .items-sortable:hover,
div.messages-separator h6:before, ul.list-notification h6:before, ul.list-activity h6:before,
.project-secondary-title a.title-project-owner-img:before {
	background-color: #607D8B;
}

/* DARK backround */
.table .table,
.gray,
#login-register-div .login-register .left-col.signin-social,
#login-register-div .login-register .right-col.signin-social,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder .plan-item .plan-custom-price,
#preloader,
.page-heading,
#ps-reports .rp-reports-list:before,
#loading_block > div,
.editor-source-container,
#crowdin-jipt-mask,
body.login,
.main-page .section.automatization,
.messages-contact-list,
.project-secondary-title,
.user-preferred-languages li {
	background-color: #263238;
}

/* ZEBRA background */
#profile-projects-list .project-row.locked td,
#profile-projects-list .project-row.locked td,
#profile-projects-list.active .project-row:hover td,
#profile-projects-list.active .project-row:hover .project-row-holder,
#profile-projects-list .project-row.locked .table-cell,
#profile-projects-list.active .project-row:hover .table-cell,
#translation_wrapper,
.btn-toolbar-divider,
.texts-to-translate-header,
.texts-to-translate-paging,
#discussions_control,
.node-inner.even,
.concordance-item:nth-child(odd),
.suggestion.suggestion-opened,
.mobile-view .suggestion.suggestion-opened,
.texts-to-translate-list li:hover,
.proofread-string-wrapper.checked,
.qq-uploader,
.table tbody tr.warning td,
.checklist-js li:hover,
#job_files tr.hover,
.project-files-manager .node-inner.even,
.items-js.items-striped tbody.items-js-content tr:nth-child(odd),
.general_activity_item:not(.opened):hover,
.table-hover tbody tr:hover td,
.table-hover tbody tr:hover th,
#icu_preview,
#login-register-div .login-register,
.checklist-single-js li.checked,
.checklist-single-js li:hover,
.pattern,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder .plan-item .plan-subscribe:before,
.section.gray,
.tour .section.strategies .tour-strategies,
.jumbotron.crowdin-hero-unit,
.chosen-container .chosen-results li.highlighted,
.vendor-page .general-info .holder > div > div:before,
.review-chart .line,
#crowdin-translation-panel .jipt-phrases-to-translate li:hover a,
.mail-table tr.unread td,
.main-page .section.customers,
.main-page .section.testimonials,
.tm-range-slider,
#length_transformation,
.numbered-control-group:before,
.numbered-label:before,
#login-register-div,
.report-group-value,
.messages-contact.unread,
.messages-message-block:hover:not(.active):not(.highlighted):not(.muted),
.files-empty-message,
.translation-progress-holder {
	background-color: #37474F !important;
}

.loadmask {
	background-color: #78909C;
}

/* YELLOW backround */
.texts-to-translate-list li.status_select,
.mobile-view .texts-to-translate-list li.status_select,
.node-inner.checked,
.term_item:hover,
.nav-pills > .active > a,
.nav-pills > .active > a:hover,
.tag_light,
#ui-datepicker-div .ui-state-hover,
#ui-datepicker-div .ui-widget-content .ui-state-hover,
#ui-datepicker-div .ui-state-focus,
#ui-datepicker-div .ui-widget-content .ui-state-focus,
.items-js .items-js-content tr.error.checked td,
#crowdin-translation-panel .jipt-phrases-to-translate li.active a,
#crowdin-translation-panel .jipt-phrases-to-translate li.active:hover a,
.status_select,
.status_select > *,
.crowdin_phrase:hover,
.crowdin_phrase:hover > *,
.messages-contact.active,
.messages-contact.active .messages-last-message,
#main_menu .nav-pills>li.active>a {
	color: #000000 !important;
	background-color: #FDD835 !important;
}

/* GREEN backround */
li.promoted-item > a,
.suggestion_tm_source ins,
.placeholder_light,
.qq-upload-drop-area,
.pricing .pricing-slider .slider-holder,
.pricing .plans-list .plans-holder .plan-item.enterprise,
.file-words-count.ready,
.crowdin_phrase_translated,
.crowdin_phrase_translated > *,
.jGrowl-notification.jGrowl-success,
.btn-primary.active,
.btn-primary:active,
.btn-primary:focus,
.tm-range-slider .ui-slider-handle,
#length_transformation .ui-slider-handle,
.messages-unread-counter {
	background-color: #558B2F !important;
	color: #FFFFFF !important;
}

.icu_light {
	background-color: #1B5E20 !important;
}

/* DARK ORANGE background */
.tag_light,
#discussions_messages li.unresolved_issue {
	background: #86680E !important;
	color: #FAFAFA !important;
}
/* RED and ORANGE backrounds */

.crowdin_phrase_untranslated,
.crowdin_phrase_untranslated > *,
.special_light {
	background-color: #52160e !important;
	color: #EEEEEE !important;
}

.suggestion_tm_source del,
.alert,
.file-words-count.untranslated {
	background-color: #F9A825 !important;
	color: #000000 !important;
}

.suggestion-rating.negative {
	border-color: #D84315 !important;
	color: #D84315 !important;
}

.items-js .items-js-content tr.error td {
	background-color: #6d1c16 !important;
}

.project-description.rich-description:after {
background: linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0),#263238 80%);
}

/* SHADOW â€“ none */
.project-settings-wrapper,
.modal-footer,
.texts-to-translate-header,
.loadmask-msg > div,
.loadmask-msg,
#ps-reports .rp-reports-list:before,
.btn.disabled,
.btn[disabled],
.btn.disabled:hover,
.btn[disabled]:hover,
#login-register-div .login-register {
	box-shadow: none;
}

.gray,
.jipt-dialog-title h4,
#crowdin-translation-panel .jipt-phrases-to-translate li.active a,
#crowdin-translation-panel .jipt-phrases-to-translate li.active:hover a {
	text-shadow: none;
}

.tour .section.page-heading .shadow,
.tour .section.tools .features-section .features-shadow-left,
.tour .section.tools .features-section .features-shadow-right,
.tour .section.file-management .tour-file-manager-holder .tour-file-manager:before,
.tour .section.strategies .tour-strategies .own-translators:after {
	background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 0%, #263238 100%);
}

/* LOADING indicator glow â€“ inserted specialy for Bemoty <3 */
.loadmask-msg:after {
	box-shadow: 0 0 20px #263238;
}

/* TRANSPARENT BACKGROUND color */
.loadmask-msg > div {
	background-color: transparent;
}

/* ICONS INVERSION*/
[class^="static-icon"]:not([class*="white"]):not([class*="green"]):not(.static-icon-apps),
[class*=" static-icon"]:not([class*="white"]):not([class*="green"]):not(.static-icon-apps),
.input-search-string .input-clear,
.input-search-string .input-loader,
.ui-widget-header .ui-icon,
.dropdown-submenu > a:after,
.datepicker-input img.datepicker-ico,
.files-js-container .folder-toggler,
.crowdin-jipt [class*="jipt-icon"],
.folder-toggler,
li.checked > a,
#features-block img {
	filter: contrast(0) sepia(100%) brightness(0) invert(1);
	opacity: 1;
}

.navbar-logo,
svg.logo-small,
.logo-icon-projects,
[class^="icon-"],
[class*=" icon-"] {
	filter: brightness(0) invert(1);
}

.static-icon-green-check {
	filter: brightness(2);
}

/* ORANGE icon */
.icon-thumbs-down {
	filter: contrast(0) sepia(100%) hue-rotate(10deg) brightness(1) saturate(10);
}

/* GREEN icon */
.icon-thumbs-up {
	filter: contrast(0) sepia(100%) hue-rotate(30deg) brightness(1) saturate(10);
}

/* NO filter */
.status_select > * > .static-icon.phrase-with-comment,
.status_select > * > .static-icon.phrase-with-issue,
li.checked > a:hover {
	filter: none !important;
}

/* NO border radius */
.nav-tabs > li > a,
.btn.btn-icon {
	border-radius: 0 !important;
}

/* SCROLLBAR Chromium*/
*::-webkit-scrollbar {
	background: #1E272B !important;
}

*::-webkit-scrollbar-button {
	display: none !important;
}

*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,
*::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
	border: 0 !important;
	box-shadow: none !important;
}

*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
	background: #455A64 !important;
}

*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
	background: #607D8B !important;
}

*::-webkit-scrollbar-corner,
*::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
	background: #1E272B !important;
}
}
